product_name: Giro Base Pockets Bike Shirt - Men's
long_description: Trust Giro to come up with the innovative Base Pockets Bike Shirt for men. Specially constructed pockets reduce sagging under the weight of contents as you wear this shirt under a bike jersey. Stash your riding essentials in this form-fitting undershirt made from a stretchy, comfortable polyester/elastin blend that wicks moisture and dries fast. Skeleton Pocket Construction(TM) adds structure with reinforcement tape in order to minimize pocket sagging in wool and other fabrics. Giro Base Pockets Bike Shirt for men features 3 open rear pockets. Flatseam construction eliminates chafing.
